thread.section_title: B&H Photo-Video Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of B&H Photo-Video | www.bhphotovideo.com | 94 of 7354
thread.title: Hugh

author: Hugh
title: Hugh
text: Having been doing business with B&H since the 1990s. The online store has just made it easier. In the past 6 years I has spent a 5-figure amount with them. The site is well laid out and the search engine one of the best. I buy a *lot* of stuff online including food items, kitchen wares, art, astronomy gear and even furniture and B&H is probably the best organized site I use. Plus, they have exceptional customer service.
